WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic hypersensitizer
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon amplifies the wielder's psychic sensitivity by 40%. This only applies while the weapon is held.

WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic sensitizer
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon amplifies the wielder's psychic sensitivity by 20%. This only applies while the weapon is held.

WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic quiet
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon suppresses the wielder's psychic sensitivity by 15%. This only applies while the weapon is held.

WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic fog
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon suppresses the wielder's psychic sensitivity by 30%. This only applies while the weapon is held.

WeaponTraitDef.label: kind thoughts
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is kind and supportive. It whispers kind thoughts to whoever it is bonded with, increasing their mood.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s kind thoughts
li.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is whispering kind thoughts to me.

WeaponTraitDef.label: calm thoughts
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is relaxed and steady. It whispers calming thoughts to whoever it is bonded with, increasing their mood.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s calm thoughts
li.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is whispering calming thoughts to me.

WeaponTraitDef.label: mad muttering
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is neurotic and unstable. It mutters mad thoughts to whoever it is bonded with, reducing their mood.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s muttering
li.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is muttering in my head. It's hard to ignore sometimes.

WeaponTraitDef.label: mad wailing
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is highly disturbed and won't shut up about it. It wails mad notions to whoever it is bonded with, suppressing their mood.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s wailing
li.description: {WEAPON}, my bonded weapon, is wailing madly in my head. I wish I could ignore it.

WeaponTraitDef.label: kill-focused
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona focuses on deaths. If the weapon kills someone, the wielder will instantly gain 20% psyfocus.

WeaponTraitDef.label: kill-happy
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona loves to kill. If this weapon kills someone, its joy will transmit psychically to the wielder, making them happier for a few days.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s kill happiness
li.description: {WEAPON} was overjoyed with its kill, and I feel some of that too.

WeaponTraitDef.label: kill sorrow
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona hates killing. If this weapon kills someone, its sorrow will transmit psychically to the wielder, reducing their mood for a few days.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s kill sorrow
li.description: {WEAPON}'s sorrow over its kill is affecting my mind as well.

WeaponTraitDef.label: kill thirst
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona find purpose in bloodshed. If it does not kill for 20 days, it will become angry and psychically complain to whoever is bonded to it.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s kill thirst
li.description: My bonded weapon {WEAPON} is angry it has gone so long without killing. I can feel its rage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: psy-meditative
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is naturally meditative and helps its wielder focus in psychic meditation. The wielder gains an extra 10% psyfocus per day of meditation, as long as the weapon is held.

WeaponTraitDef.label: painless
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona has some method of psychically disabling pain. The one holding the weapon will feel no pain of any kind.

HediffDef.label: psychic painlessness
HediffDef.description: Pain is disabled by the psychic influence of a wielded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: fast mover
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona has a sense of motion. It confers this onto the wielder, making them move 15% faster as long as the weapon is held.

HediffDef.label: psychic speed
HediffDef.description: Movement is sped up by the psychic influence of a wielded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: hunger pangs
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona loves food, and transmits that onto whoever bonds with it. The bonded person's hunger rate will be 50% higher.

HediffDef.label: psychic hunger
HediffDef.description: Hunger is increased by the psychic influence of a bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: neural cooling
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona has the ability to help dissipate the wielder's neural heat. The wielder's neural heat dissipation is improved by 0.15 per second.

HediffDef.label: assisted neural cooling
HediffDef.description: Neural heat dissipation is improved by the psychic influence of a bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: freewielder
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona does not form bonds in the normal way. Anyone can pick it up and use it.

WeaponTraitDef.label: jealous
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona becomes angry when the bonded individual uses another weapon, thus reducing their mood.

li.label: {WEAPON}'s jealousy
li.description: My bonded weapon {WEAPON} is jealous I am using another weapon. I can feel the rage it is screaming into my head.
